overview: Paul Demirdjian serves as President and Chief Executive Officer at Jagged Peak, Inc. Paul has more than twenty-five years of experience in senior management, including executive positions of Senior Vice President of Operations, Chief Technology Officer and Director for over ten years at Davel Communications, a Nasdaq listed telecom company. Paul was instrumental in design and architecture of our EDGE application and has deep industry expertise.He has served on the Board since the inception of Jagged Peak in 2000. Paul holds an Electronic Engineering Technology degree from the Saint Petersburg College, where he was a member of the Engineering Honor Society (Tau Alpha Pi). Mr. Demirdjian is currently a member of Pinellas County’s Economic Development Council.
